title: Business Phone Call
description: Handle professional phone calls with confidence

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Good afternoon, ABC Corporation. This is Jennifer speaking. How may I help you?

lines.speaker: user
lines.text: Good afternoon. This is Taro Yamada calling from XYZ Company. May I speak with Mr. Johnson, please?

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: I'm sorry, Mr. Johnson is in a meeting right now. Would you like to leave a message?

lines.speaker: user
lines.text: Yes, please. Could you ask him to call me back regarding our upcoming project?

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Of course. May I have your phone number?

lines.speaker: user
lines.text: Yes, it's 03-1234-5678. That's zero three, one two three four, five six seven eight.

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Let me confirm: zero three, one two three four, five six seven eight. Is that correct?

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: And what time would be best to reach you?

lines.speaker: user
lines.text: Anytime between 2 and 5 PM would be fine.

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: I'll make sure he gets the message. Is there anything else I can help you with?

lines.speaker: user
lines.text: No, that's all. Thank you for your help.

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: You're welcome. Have a great day!
